description: Try our easy to follow Tomato & Pesto Tart with Ricotta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury pie & tart,High protein,Egg free,Tomato,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Tomato & Pesto Tart with Ricotta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 sheet frozen butter puff pastry, partially thawed
150g chunky basil cashew and parmesan dip

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Place baking trays in oven to preheat.

Place each pastry sheet onto a sheet of baking paper. Trim to 20x25cm. Spread dip over pastry, leaving a 5cm border around the edges. Sprinkle with half of the ricotta and top with halved tomatoes. Season with salt and pepper. Fold pastry borders in to form an edge.
Slide tarts, on baking paper, onto hot trays and cook for 20-25 minutes or until pastry is golden and cooked through. Sprinkle remaining ricotta on top. Garnish with basil leaves to serve.
